column5: Home yesterday, fished Little Chaimberlain area last week. Weather cold, rain, east wind, snow. Water temp 58. Not as many fish but more slot fish. Night crawlers workerd with jigs, save your money for gas, $1.41 ltr boat gas. Gulp 3inch minnow worked ok., leaches once in a while. Fish on people. No probl;ems at the border either way.
do you stay on a house boat or Obijway Outfitters?
